title: Segment Customer Data in a CDP
description: An analyst needs to create a new audience segment in a Customer Data Platform (CDP) for customers who have viewed a specific product but not purchased.

tasks.description: Define the first condition: users who triggered a 'product_view' event for a specific SKU.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets up the first rule in the CDP's segmentation tool.

tasks.description: Define the second condition: users who have NOT triggered a 'purchase' event for that same SKU.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent adds an exclusion rule to the segment definition.

tasks.description: Save the segment as 'Product Viewers - No Purchase' for use in retargeting campaigns.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates and saves the new audience segment.
